title: Disable Private Mode temporarily
content:
I AM NOT TECH SAVVY, SO PLEASE RESPOND IN APPORPIATE LANGUARE  :-) I HAVE AVG ON MY SAMSUNG ADROID MOBILE FOR INTERNET SECURITY. I AM IN NEED OF RENEWAL. WHEN I CLICK TO DO SO, I AM STOPPED WITH THE FOLLOWING MSG:

PRIVATE BROWSING MODE NOT SUPPORTED ON THIS WEBSITE AS COOKIES ARE REQUIRE FOR YOUR PURCHASE. PLEASE TRY AGAIN AFTER TURNING PRIVATE BROWSING MODE OFF AND ENSURE COOKIES ARE ENABLED IN ORDER TO SHOW THE CONTENT OF THE SIRE CORRECTLY.

AFTER SEARCHING ON MY PC FOR INSTRUCTION ON HOW TO DO THIS, I AM UNABLE TO FIND AN ANSWER. I ONLY WISH TO DISABLE PRIVATE MODE TEMPORARILY. CAN IT BE "TURNED OFF AND ON" ? HOW ?

THANK YOU FOR YOUR ASSISTANCE.
creator: jentpt63
